mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MockData(name, method, path, groupid, updateTime) values(#{name}, #{method}, #{path},#{groupid}, STRFTIME('%s', 'now')*1000 + SUBSTR(STRFTIME('%f', 'now'), 4))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MockData WHERE id=#{0}; DELETE FROM MockSence WHERE mockid=#{0};
mapper.update: UPDATE MockData set name=#{name}, method=#{method}, path=#{path}, groupid=#{groupid}, updateTime=(STRFTIME('%s', 'now')*1000 + SUBSTR(STRFTIME('%f', 'now'), 4)) where id=#{id}
